If you missed Bully the first time around, scholarship edition is a great game to pick up.

With inventive puzzles, dazzling visuals and a wonderful game world just ripe for exploration, this is a launch title worth buying.
A good example of a developer using an excellent license (in this case, two licenses) to its advantage.
